amendatorysection.para: The full term of office of each judge shall commence: (1) On the first Thursday after the first Tuesday in January next succeeding the election referred to in sections 24-813 to 24-818, or (2) if appointed pursuant to Article V of the Constitution of Nebraska, on the date of his or her appointment, as the case may be. For purposes of sections 24-817 and 24-818, the end of the term of office shall be the first Thursday after the first Tuesday in January next succeeding the retention election required by section 24-814.

annotation.para: Action of Legislature in adopting this section simply declaratory of Constitution. Garrotto v. McManus, 185 Neb. 644, 177 N.W.2d 570 (1970).
